name: pnp-powerplatform-samples-bodypart-gallery
title: Bodypart Gallery
shortDescription: An app with a Body Part Selection gallery that can be applied to a canvas app to select various parts of the body.
longDescription: An app with a Body Part Selection gallery that can be applied to a canvas app to select various parts of the body. Use case - A reporting app that requires that the injured body part be submitted as a multi-choice option to a DB.

references.name: Overview of creating apps in Power Apps
references.description: Power Apps is a high-productivity development platform for business apps.

references.name: Power Apps canvas apps documentation
references.description: Design and build a business app from a canvas in Microsoft Power Apps with data from a variety of sources without writing any code using traditional programming languages, such as C#.
